messages.text: Hello Player, I am your personal emotional financial advisor.
I understand you're asking about your situation. Based on your current progress, here's what I think...
Main tumhe guide kar sakta hun. Tell me more about what you need.
Tum kis cheez mein acche ho
Main samajh raha hun ki tum your situation ke baare mein puch rahe ho. Tumhari current progress dekhte hue...
Mere baare mein kuch jaante ho?
Main samajh raha hun ki tum your situation ke baare mein puch rahe ho. Tumhari current progress dekhte hue...
Mere baare mein kuch pata h
I understand you're asking about your situation. Based on your current progress, here's what I think...
